entry.title: News Feed Changed
entry.summary: Visit now <a href="http://vanadetrack.blogspot.com">Vanade Track Blog<a> to stay notified about news concerning the Vanade XHTML Web Editor Online.

entry.title: Version 0.02 alpha released
entry.summary: New version includes correction to the display menu, about and to-do.

entry.title: Version 0.01 alpha released
entry.summary: Vanade preview releases for public. Real-time editor and basic highlighter are the begining features.
